title: UK civil society rise of greens, fall of unions

content.prompt: Since the 1970s, which civil society groups in the United Kingdom have increased and which have decreased their representation in Parliament?

choices.label: Representation of trade unions has increased, while representation of the Anglican church and environmental groups has decreased.
Representation of trade unions and environmental groups has increased, while representation of the Anglican church has decreased.
Representation of environmental groups has increased, while representation of the Anglican church and trade unions has decreased.
Representation of the Anglican church and environmental groups has increased, while representation of trade unions has decreased.
Representation of the Anglican church has increased, while representation of trade unions and environmental groups has decreased.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
